member.name: M:OneRegister.Api.MasterCard.Controllers.InquiryController.Patch(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: update the status of the inquiry task and change it to be in Inprogress state. It means this inquiry will be run in the next iteration.
member.param: this Id comes from GEMS database and most likely should be equivalent of CDDActionID
at the moment all posible values for Inquiry Type are: RPP,DV,SS or IV

member.name: M:OneRegister.Api.MasterCard.Controllers.TokenController.Get
member.summary: before each request you need to get and provide a token and send this token as Bearer Authentication in further requests
